titleStmt.title: Englands apology, for its late change: or, A sober persvvasive, of all disaffected or dissenting persons, to a seasonable engagement, for the settlement of this common-vvealth. Drawne from the workings of providence. The state of affaires. The danger of division.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Matthew Simmons, and are to be sold in Aldersgate-streete,

notesStmt.note: The words "The workings of providence.", "The state of affaires.", and "The danger of division." are enclosed in three pairs of brackets on the title page.
Another edition has imprint: .. printed by M.S. for Livewel Chapman ..
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
